thread.title: 5 things to do over Labour Weekend
thread.title_full: 5 things to do over Labour Weekend

title: 5 things to do over Labour Weekend
text:
5 things to do over Labour Weekend Last updated 08:30, October 12 2015 Jess Etheridge 
Model Annaliese Cobb gets her makeup done as part of a special FX competition at the 2014 Armageddon Expo. 
The first long weekend in months is coming up â€“ so get planning to make the most of it. 
1. Auckland Armageddon 
The 20th anniversary of New Zealand's biggest pop culture event comes to Auckland's ASB showgrounds over Labour Weekend. Enjoy all the latest in gaming and technology, a burning man, cosplay, live wrestling, and meet the stars from Harry Potter , The Simpsons , Doctor Who and more. 
2. Mini Madness in Masterton 
Come and see more than 100 of these iconic cars line up down Queen St as Masterton hosts the 21st Mini Nationals . Models include Mk I & II, Mk III, Mk IV, Mk V onwards, Variant (Factory), BMW MINI and Clubmans. Between 9am and 1pm on Saturday, October 24. 
3. Gisborne Wine & Food Festival 
The region's cellar doors will open for two days between 11am and 5pm, enabling wine lovers to visit at their own pace. The highlight of the weekend will be a six-course "Celebrate Chardonnay" degustation dinner, where local winemakers match their wines to the fare of regional chefs. 
4. Christchurch Big Band Festival 
Get into the groove with the 9th Christchurch Big Band Festival . There will be plenty of free performances in public spaces such as ReStart Mall, the Downtown Farmers Market at the Commons and the Cardboard Cathedral. Also enjoy workshops and meet and greets with musicians. 
5. Cuisine@Clyde Ad Feedback 
The historic goldmining town of Clyde is hosting a food festival featuring the best of Central Otago's produce and cooking demonstrations with chefs Peta Mathias and Nici Wickes, and local MasterChef contestants. A barbecue competition will be held on Saturday night, hosted by Kerre McIvor, and a wine- and food-matching dinner is planned for Sunday evening. - Stuff
